videoDetails.Title: How to Win in Top Tier Ground RB | War Thunder
videoDetails.Description:
A lot goes into play in ground RB, and TBH, some things are out of your control. Some lineups are naturally weaker, and in some BRs teams just die. But using some of these tips just might help those of y'all who may not be as experienced :) BTW, new outro, lemme know what you think? I'm super proud of it personally. 

00:00 MAGAAAAACH
000:50 Respawn, respawn, respawn (also lineups)
02:10 Perceptiveness
02:22 Sound is crucial
03:30 Using Arty for Spotting
03:55 Minimap
05:07 Smoke use
05:35 GAMESHOW
06:30 Familiarize yourself with enemy tanks
07:25 Smart Use of terrain
08:25 Be Frugal with Spawnpoints
08:59 New Outro :)

Outro Music - "Just Free" produced by Lucas Ricciotti under license, used with permission: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=keAw242XAeo

Game music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYfKhh5rN14
